lexUnit.name: capture.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the event of taking someone or something captive.

sentence.text: In recent weeks , the Pentagon offered $ 15 million for information leading to the capture of each brother .

Especially demoralizing was the Aug. 30 capture of about 250 troops , most of them members of the Frontier Corps , who surrendered without a fight .

Until now , the Taliban 's only known American military prisoner has been Bowe Bergdahl , an Idaho native who was an Army private at the time of his capture 13 months ago in eastern Afghanistan .
